verse.unicode: ਸਖ਼ੁਨ ਰਾ ਬ-ਵਸਫ਼ਸ਼ ਚਿ ਹੱਦੋ ਮਜਾਲ ॥ ੫੧ ॥

en.bdb: By nature, he is generous, and comeliness is in his character,
